quotes: of Delegation Chairs from 17 September 2009 to 30 June 2014, reflecting his prior experience as European Commissioner for Development and Humanitarian Aid.
During the 8th term (2014–2019), Michel continued as an ALDE member and took on leadership as Chair of the Delegation to the ACP–EU Joint Parliamentary Assembly
took on leadership as Chair of the Delegation to the ACP–EU Joint Parliamentary Assembly from 4 September 2014 to 1 July 2019
contributed to the Committee of Inquiry on Money Laundering, Tax Avoidance and Tax Evasion (24 June 2016 to 13 December 2017)
Special Committee on Financial Crimes, Tax Evasion and Tax Avoidance (14 March 2018 to 1 July 2019).
serving as rapporteur for the opinion on the EU-Madagascar Fisheries Partnership Agreement (adopted 2 June 2015)
organ harvesting in China (adopted 27 July 2016 with 414 signatories)
maternal healthcare in developing countries (lapsed 24 May 2016 with 174 signatories)
Following the conclusion of his term as a Member of the European Parliament on 1 July 2019, Louis Michel retired from active political involvement
In June 2021, he assisted the Brussels branch of the Mouvement Réformateur (MR) by campaigning against what he described as communitarian influences threatening democratic discourse
